com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet

Class Facet.StatsFacet<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet.Facet
      • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet.Facet.StatsFacet<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Facet.StatsDateFacet, Facet.StatsNumericFacet, Facet.StatsUtilDateFacet
    Enclosing class:
    Facet

    public static class Facet.StatsFacet<T>
extends Facet
    Allows to configure a basic stats facet query. A stats facet query returns statistics calculated based on documents for an specific document field any type T. This class covers the statistics which can be perform on any kind of content.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet.Facet

    • Constructor Detail

      • StatsFacet

        public StatsFacet(String name,
                  FieldDescriptor field,
                  String... pivotNames)
        Create a new instance of Facet.StatsFacet.
        Parameters:
        name - String with a custom name for the new instance.
        field - FieldDescriptor to calculate the statistics on.
        pivotNames - Name of the pivots using this facet.

        Returns:
        FieldDescriptor describing the field in which the pivot facet query will be perform.
